description: Coefficients of order n in Baker-Campbell-Hausdorff expansion.
references: J. A. Oteo, The Baker-Campbell-Hausdorff formula and nested commutator relations, J. Math. Phys., 32 (1991), 419-421.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: David J. Thompson.
